channel.title: Lecture 7 :: AD3 Homepage
channel.description: Slides and Topics Today is a flipped lecture on SAT. This lecture will prepare you for problem 3 of assignment 2. Watch the following videos. The cover slides 1-29 of SAT-intro and slides 1-4 of SAT-CDCL. SAT1.pdf (SAT1.mp4) SAT2.pdf (SAT2.mp4) SAT3.pdf (SAT3.mp4) SAT4.pdf (SAT4.mp4) SAT5.pdf (SAT5.mp4) Reading Material The textbook does not cover SAT, but the following resources are helpful.
